categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Rodian Jedi fought alongside both Lumas Etima and a Twi'lek Jedi at the Petranaki arena during the Battle of Geonosis in 22 BBY.

This Rodian Jedi was introduced by Hasbro in 2003, as part of the Jedi Knight Army multipack. He was later given a full body illustration by Jason Edmiston for the 2010, Rodian Jedi & Battle Droid multipack. Text included on the back of the 2010 multipack implies that this Rodian survived the Battle of Geonosis.
